message.content: {"id": "13620", "title": "Bug 13620 - The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with a large amount of white space", "description": "", "OB": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with a large amount of white space.", "EB": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page should not have excessive white space.", "SR": "The vertical alignment of the text should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING. Steps to reproduce the issue: 1) Load a project from the repository, 2) Select a source folder, 3) Open Properties, 4) Select Java Source Attachment, 5) [Details]. You will notice an info label in the middle of the dialog."}

origin.input_prompt:

In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
